channel.title: Offline Installation (preferable)
channel.description: It is more secure to avoid installing the operating system while connected to the internet, as also advised in [Debian’s security manual](https://www.debian.org/doc/manuals/securing-debian-manual/ch03s03.en.html).

item.title: Offline Installation (preferable)
item.dc:creator: nurmagoz
item.description:
It is more secure to avoid installing the operating system while connected to the internet, as also advised in Debian’s security manual.
